## IPixelBuffer.getAt() method

Returns pixel value at given position. If pos is outside the defined region, returns a suitable zero value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAt(x: number, y: number): P;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> |  |
|  y | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`P`
